title: Wants To Lose Weightsan & Broken Heartchan
alternative_title: 痩せたいさんと失恋ちゃん; Yasetai-san to Shitsuren-chan; Yasetai-san and Shitsuren-chan
status: 痩せたいさんと失恋ちゃん; Yasetai-san to Shitsuren-chan; Yasetai-san and Shitsuren-chan
description:
Description :
        Rinko is a high school girl on a diet. On her morning run, she happens to meet Shiori, her first love and former tutor. Will Rinko's love be rekindled when she meets her again?
